tossup_question: -   –  A supersaturated solution of sodium nitrate was prepared at 80 degrees Celsius but cooled to room temperature. Which of the following statements describes the addition of a seed crystal?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Delta H is negative and Delta S is negative
X) Delta H is positive and Delta S is negative
Y) Delta H is negative and Delta S is positive
Z) Delta H is positive and Delta S is positive
tossup_answer: ANSWER: W) DELTA H IS NEGATIVE AND DELTA S IS NEGATIVE
bonus_question: -   –  Rank the following three 0.1 molar solutions from the least basic to most basic: 1) Urea; 2) Ammonia; 3) Barium hydroxide.
